title: (Mon Full) Bobby Recaps The Raging Idiots Opening for Garth Brooks in Arkansas! + Someone Else Gets Offered A Movie Role + Bobby Announces Next Comedy Show
itunes:title: (Mon Full) Bobby Recaps The Raging Idiots Opening for Garth Brooks in Arkansas! + Someone Else Gets Offered A Movie Role + Bobby Announces Next Comedy Show
description:
Bobby and Eddie got to open up for Garth Brooks over the weekend at Razorback Stadium. They share stories and cool moments. And in an odd turn of events, another member of the show gets offered a movie role. Bobby also announces the dates and location for his comedy shows this summer in Nashville!

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
